verbose_text: Lack of CHD5 affects the early stages of neural migration (XREF_FIG A) and induces ectopic expression of the upper layer markers Cux1 and SATB2 (XREF_FIG A and 5B), whereas CHD3 is necessary for the late stages of neural radial migration (XREF_FIG C) and laminar specification (XREF_FIG C-5F).
evidence: expression of the upper layer markers Cux1
